ddf.catalog.util.impl

Class SourcePoller

  • java.lang.Object
    • ddf.catalog.util.impl.SourcePoller

  • public class SourcePoller
extends Object
    The SourcePoller is the scheduler of the task to poll all configured sources at a fixed interval to determine their availability. It is created by the CatalogFramework's blueprint.

    An isAvailable() method is included in this class so that the caller, nominally the CatalogFramework, can retrieve the cached availability of a specific source, or have it polled on demand if there is no availability status cached.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SourcePoller(SourcePollerRunner incomingRunner)
      Constructor to schedule the SourcePollerRunner to execute immediately and at a fixed interval, currently set at every 1 minute.

    • Constructor Detail

      • SourcePoller

        public SourcePoller(SourcePollerRunner incomingRunner)
        Constructor to schedule the SourcePollerRunner to execute immediately and at a fixed interval, currently set at every 1 minute. This constructor is invoked by the CatalogFramework's blueprint.
        Parameters:
        incomingRunner - the SourcePollerRunner to use for polling

    • Method Detail

      • getCachedSource

        public CachedSource getCachedSource(Source source)
        Retrieves a CachedSource which contains cached values from the specified Source. Returns a Source with values from the last polling interval. If the Source is not known, null is returned.
        Parameters:
        source - the source to get the CachedSource for
        Returns:
        a CachedSource which contains cached values

      • cancel

        public void cancel(CatalogFramework framework,
                   Map properties)
        Cancels the SourcePollerRunner thread that had been previously scheduled to run at specific intervals. Invoked by the CatalogFramework's blueprint when the framework is unregistered/uninstalled.
        Parameters:
        framework - unused, but required by blueprint
        properties - unused, but required by blueprint

      • start

        public void start(CatalogFramework framework,
                  Map properties)
        Start method for this poller, invoked by the CatalogFramework's blueprint when the framework is registered/installed. No logic is executed except for logging the framework name.
        Parameters:
        framework - the catalog framework being started
        properties - unused, but required by blueprint

      • getInterval

        public int getInterval()

      • setInterval

        public void setInterval(int interval)
